TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceDescriptionImportStyle extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是要匯入至伺服器，還是用戶端電腦。

span.span: Specifies whether the import is made to the server or to the client computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匯入對用戶端電腦會產生 proxy 類別叫用 XML Web 服務中的每個方法的同步和非同步方法。An import made to the client computer generates a proxy class with synchronous and asynchronous methods to invoke each method within an XML Web service. 伺服器匯入，相反地，會產生具有抽象成員，您必須覆寫，以提供您需要實作的抽象類別。A server import, on the other hand, generates an abstract class with abstract members, which you must override to provide the implementation you need. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client/CPP/servicedescriptionimportstyle_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client/CS/servicedescriptionimportstyle_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionImportStyle_Client/VB/servicedescriptionimportstyle_client.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle Client = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定應該向用戶端電腦進行匯入。

span.span: Specifies that the import should be made to the client computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle Server = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定應該向伺服器進行匯入。

span.span: Specifies that the import should be made to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle ServerInterface = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定應該向伺服器介面進行匯入。

span.span: Specifies that the import should be made to a server interface.
